title: Deviate Cycles press send on the Highlander 150 for rowdier, harder descending
content:
Deviate Cycles, makers of high-pivot full suspension mountain bikes, have today announced the arrival of the Highlander 150. New, but not all-new, the Highlander 150 arises from a new linkage that converts the original 140mm trail bike to a bigger travel, slacker all-mountain beast.Â  Deviate Highlander 150 The new Deviate Highlander 150 runs, you guessed […]

The post Deviate Cycles press send on the Highlander 150 for rowdier, harder descending appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
